Articles.Content:
I just bought the game yesterday and had that weird loading screen bug but I fixed it by changing windows language to English. Eventually I started building something like the ISS.

Today I loaded my save and when I went to VAB to build another module I saw that I cannot launch the spacecraft from the VAB. I can only launch it from the launch pad but the thing is when I try to launch it from the launch pad I cannot revert to launch or revert to VAB. In addition to that bug I can't also quicksave or save. My last save is from yesterday and the game is not autosaving as well. Naturally I'm stuck with no game save and I need some fix.

Same here, game saving stopped work during gameplay with no error message.

Save dialog had been working as expected but game did not create any save in savegames folder for two hours and I was not able to make any new save any way I have tried. Any way to save current game stopped working. autosave, regular save, quick save, and even save and exit did not do anything, no new saves added.

After restarting game it started working again.

The only way to play broken crap like this is saving, saving and saving. Often. And even saving doesn't work.
